name: Janggun-ui Adeul
overview: Janggun-ui Adeul is an unlicensed beat 'em up game released in South Korea for the Sega Master System. It was at one point planned for a Sega Game Gear release in North America as Street Hero, but the plans fell through. The game is based on the South Korean film with the same name, which can be translated like General's Son (or Son of the General).
